Name.markdownDescription:
The Name of the S3AccessPointAttachment

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: ^(?=[a-z0-9])[a-z0-9-]{1,48}[a-z0-9]$  
Update requires: Replacement

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: OPENZFS  
Update requires: Replacement
